verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Ewe Bwana-a,
Bwana, Bwana, ewe Bwana . x2
Ewe Bwana-a, utuhurumie. x4

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Ewe Kristu- u,
Kristu, Kristu, ewe Kristu. x2
Ewe Kristu- u, utuhurumie. x4

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Ewe Bwana-a,
Bwana, Bwana, ewe Bwana . x2
Ewe Bwana-a, utuhurumie. x4
